name: Gordon Ramsay
short_bio: Renowned British chef known for his fiery personality and Michelin-starred restaurants.

name: Julia Child
short_bio: Iconic American chef and television personality who introduced French cuisine to a wide audience.

name: Massimo Bottura
short_bio: Acclaimed Italian chef known for his innovative approach to traditional Italian cuisine.

name: Anthony Bourdain
short_bio: Renowned chef, author, and TV host who brought global cuisines and cultures to television audiences.

name: Nigella Lawson
short_bio: British chef, author, and television personality known for her indulgent and comforting recipes.

name: Jamie Oliver
short_bio: Popular British chef and campaigner for healthier school meals and home cooking.
